subject: info
body:
Dear Carol.
I have acknowledged receipt of your message and also  appreciate your
condolence words on the tragedy of my Boss and his family, thanks.
Now on your question concerning your contact information, i was going on
with some global business news and names to contact for this project and
luckily i have your name appeared, not really knowing whom you are, but a
day begins a story,
Without wasting much time i would like that we commence this project
arrangement as soon as we can make it, the funds are deposited in a Vault
in America as we speak, then i would want that you send to me your full
contact details to present to the Deposit Security Company in the U.S as
the Next of Kin to the late Mark Openshaw and ask for the funds deposit to
be handed over to you.
Based on this information, you would be required to travel down to the
States of Atlanta in America and sign out the package for transfer to your
account to the country or  state of your choice and once it is done we
shall meet face to face for the disbursement of the fund 60% for me and 40%
for you.
Get back to me urgently to move to the next step.
Sincerely,
Denis Clark

subject: Re: info
body:
Hello Denis Clark,

Thank you for your prompt response and the details provided. I'm sorry to hear about the tragedy that befell your boss and his family.

I must say, this is quite an unexpected situation for me. I'm just a simple person who happened to be on some global business news list. It's intriguing how life can take such surprising turns, isn't it?

Before we proceed further, could you please provide me with more information about this project? What exactly does it entail? And why was I chosen as the Next of Kin to the late Mark Openshaw?

Also, traveling to Atlanta might be a bit challenging for me at the moment due to my current commitments. Is there any other way we could facilitate this process without me having to travel?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: update
body:
Dear Carol.
Thanks for your response , kindly note that I would like to be very
explicit on this transaction and also work with the limited time frame in
making sure that i achieve my aim
I told you in my early message. that am the confidant of Mr Mark Openshaw
and his personal Assistance, the issue about his death is something that is
known and was published in most dalies in the States.
But for the fact that i was his P.A till his death, gave me this ample
opportunity to make out this deal with you, i have all the documents of the
deposit with me, which i will now use your name and contact and present to
the deposit Security Company as the Next  of the Kin o the late Openshaw.
Based on this note you shall be expected to travel down to America to sign
out this fund in deposit as the matter demands and move it to any account
of your choice any where, therefore let me know your willingness this
project to its conclusive end, but if a situation that you cannot make it i
would suggest that you send your full contact particulars to be used and
send a power of Attorney to a  legal practitioner in the states to work and
act on your behalf and then take care of his charges with me.
Sincerely,
Dennis Clark

subject: Re: update
body:
Hello Dennis Clark,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite an interesting situation you've described, and I appreciate your trust in sharing this with me. 

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please tell me more about Mr. Mark Openshaw? What kind of person was he? And how did you come to be his confidant?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the process of signing out the fund? I've never been involved in such a transaction before, so it would be helpful to understand what exactly is required.

Lastly, regarding the power of Attorney, could you provide some more information on how that works? Who would the legal representative be in the states?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: update
body:
Hello Carol.
Kindly log on to the Google and search of Mark openshew and his wife Amy
and children who died in the year  June 2015 a date I really do not want to
remember again at least it will guide you more on your question on my
relationship with my Boss.

subject: Mark openshew tragedy
body:
https://images.app.goo.gl/etyyU5KQc584KA3t9
Regrets.
Dennis Clark

subject: Re: update
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your response. I'm sorry to hear about the tragic event involving Mark Openshew and his family. It must have been a difficult time for everyone who knew them.

I'll definitely look up more information about this on Google as you suggested. Could you perhaps share more about your relationship with Mr. Openshew? How did his passing affect your work or personal life? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: update
body:
Hi Carol.
Like I said early to you I wouldn't want to continue on just this questions
your bringing up, you have not even identify your self and even the
proposal not discussed.
So kindly let me know whom you are by simple ID whether your man or woman I
don't know.
Again I need to be sure of your capabilities to handle this matter if all
issues is agreed, what do you for a living and work and position.
Thanks.
Dennis
https://images.app.goo.gl/WG1qdK6LLL6qq2Ty6

subject: Re:
body:
Hello there,

I hope you're having a great day! I'm excited to share some information with you. Can we start by discussing your interests? What topics are you most curious about?

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: Mark openshew tragedy
body:
Hello Dennis Clark,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm curious to know more about the topic you're referring to. Could you please provide some additional details?

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: update
body:
Hi Dennis,

Thank you for your response. I understand your concerns and I'm happy to share more about myself. My name is Carol, and I am a woman. As for my profession, I work in the field of market research.

I hope this information helps you feel more comfortable. Could you please tell me more about the proposal you mentioned earlier? What are the issues that need to be agreed upon?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re:
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to share. Could you please provide some more details?

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: Mark openshew tragedy
body:
Carol.
Unless you didn't get my message too well, I said in my message to you
concerning the fund belonging to Mr Mark Openshew who happened to be my
Boss that died in a plane crash some years back 2016.
The cash deposit is $10.5M in a security deposit vault in Atlanta Georgia,
waiting for clearance.
Now am inviting you as his P.A to send your details to be prepared and
presented as the next of Kin to the late Mark Openshew and his family.

Based on this note and the already post of his death  on google that I sent
to you, I expected that by now you must have sent your full details so that
we can move to the next step.
Am waiting to hear from you.
Sincerely.
Dennis Clark.

I'm curious, how did you find me and why do you think I could be related to Mr. Openshaw? Also, could you please provide more information about this process? What does it involve exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

subject: Re:
body:
Carol
I expected you to respond to me if you're interested in my business
partnership proposal on becoming the person to be presented as the Next of
Kin to my late Boss Mr Mark Openshaw.
All documents concerning the transaction project would be prepared and sent
to you once you fully indicates your interest, am waiting to hear from you.
Sincerely.
Dennis Clark
